title: 'Pears sabun 8 mangae the aur char hi nikale'
'You may regret ordering this'
column5: I ordered this new soap keeping in mind the Pears Original Glycerine soap. If you like over powering scent of sweet roses
column6: you may like it. Otherwise soap does the foaming and cleansing part fine. No dryness of skin. The fragrance is not as per my liking. Original Pears fans
column7: better stay away. Press Helpful button as Like button.'

title: 'Pears Pomegranate soap'

title: 'Not good small & easy breakable'
body: I don't like this small. Very irritating small. Half usage of the soap , it will break very early . I think the break was a accident. At last i realised that all soap are breakable very early

title: 'Pomegranate soap.'

title: 'Inferior quality product'
body: It's just like an ordinary bathing soap. It does not have the true fragrance nor quality of the world famous brand Pears. It's not worth buying. Look for some genuine Pears soap having the right quality and appropriate fragrance.

title: 'Extremely bad for skin my skin started to breakout'
body: This sope is very harsh on skin my started to break out and I'm facing body acne because of this sope DO NOT USE ON SIKN.

title: 'Worst Soap'
body: I have been using Pears since childhood, so i thought of trying this new variant but it gave me extremely dry skin and when you use it over face it started giving me burning sensation. It's by far the worst Soap i have ever used. Don't recommend it

title: 'Awesome scent'
body: The product doesn't last long ascompared to the pears glycerine one, but smells very good

title: 'Disgusting smell and Burning sensation on facial skin'
body: 'Pears is supposed to be gentle soap due to its glycerine content however this version is sharp smelling chemical in odour and also leaves burning sensation on facial smooth skin. It also darkened my facial skin.'

title: 'Please ask your people to ring the door bell.'
body: Please ask your people to ring the door bell as I'm in office and someone took the product.

title: 'Old product delivered'
body: 'Ordered a pack of 4 soaps on July-22. Got a pack of 3 soaps manufactured on Jan-21. The soap scent was nice but instead of being solid
column5: the soap has become more like a jelly'

title: 'Disgusting smell'
